item.title: Live Updates: China and Europe Vow to Respond to Trump’s Tariffs
item.description: Investors’ shock at the size of the levies sent markets in Asia sharply lower. Experts warned that the global economy could be upended.

item.title: Netanyahu Arrives in Hungary, Finding a Rare Welcome in Europe
item.description: The visit comes as the Israeli prime minister faces an arrest warrant against him by the International Criminal Court.
